app_descript:
App Name: All Status Saver

Brief: All Status Saver is a versatile tool designed to enhance the WhatsApp user experience, allowing users to conveniently download and share status videos, images, and even indulge in conversations with their contacts. It's crafted for those who wish to keep a record of memorable statuses or engage with them in a more dynamic way.
